subject: Engaging IT Support Assistant (erstwhile Data Lake Operator)- reg.
text: HRralq 77ezy <THRf qfetazrut (434 4Rae- & RTAFf #A14, HRa TA) National Highways Authority of India T74 Tna (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 01l-5 Q 6, 772r-10, ETA;, 75 @ovll 110 075 2 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 3414/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ IT/ 2024 Policy Circular No.6.37/2024 dated 26th October, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/IT/2021 /ITManpower-PIUs (Part-File-1) (Comp. No. 65873)} (In supersession of earlier Policy Circular No. 6.32/2022 dated 22nd September 2022) Sub: Engaging IT Support Assistant (erstwhile Data Lake Operator)- reg: With the approval of Competent Authority, one manpower was sanctioned to All Members, CGMs at NHAI HQ, ROs and PDs exclusively for updating information in Data Lake Portal. 2 The daily, weekly, monthly input into the Data Lake System have been Standardised_ Further, vide Om dated 15.03.2022, the basic Standard Operating Procedures (SoPs) encompassing duties to be performed by Data Lake Operators were issued and concerned Reporting Officer viz. CGMs, ROs, PDs etc. were requested to monitor the performance of these Operators: 3 As the third year extension of Data Lake Operators is expiring in next few months, therefore, the matter was reviewed during the 635th Executive Committee (EC) meeting held on 10.10.2024. 4_ Accordingly, the following has been decided: 4.1 One IT Support Assistant (erstwhile Data Lake Operator) may be engaged at all levels viz. Members, CGMs at NHAI HQ, ROs and PIUs for one more year beyond third year. 4.2 The Terms of Reference (ToR) to be performed by the IT Support Assistant is attached at Annexure-A which will be updated and notified on Data Lake Portal from time to time. The Scope of Services includes providing assistance to NHAI Officers in updating Data and Records in Data Lake and other IT Portals in NHAI. 4.3 The engagement of IT Support Assistant shall be made in a transparent procedure after laid down procurement procedures and guidelines for Public Procurement  4.4 IT Support Assistant may be engaged through Outsource Agencies preferably through NICSI at a prevailing empanelment rate under Tier-3 Category ensuring uniformity of Rates at HQ and PIUs as per following details Minimum Agency Margin Amount NICSI Margin Total Amount Monthly @4.94% (Excluding GST) @ 7% of (C) (Excluding GST) Remuneration (B) (C) (D) (E) (C) (D) 40,000/- 1,976/ - 41,976/ 2,938/- 44,914/ - Contd__2I - #717 NHAI
